hymn.title: It's so easy to love the Lord
hymn.chords: | C - G - | Am - G/B - | C - G - | F - C - | C - G - | Am - G/B - | C - G - | F - C - | C - - - | C - G - | C - - - | C - G - | C - Dm7 - | C/E F G - | Am - F - | C/G - G - | C - G - | F - C - |

layout.singingstanza: It's so eas -- y to love the Lord. It's so eas -- y to love the Lord. It's so eas -- y to love the Lord. It's so eas -- y to love the Lord. It's so eas -- y, it's so eas -- y— A -- men. It's so eas -- y, it's so eas -- y— love Him. It's so eas -- y, it's so eas -- y— A -- men. It's so eas -- y, it's so eas -- y— love Him. It's so eas -- y to love the Lord.

lyrics.stanza: It's so easy to love the Lord. It's so easy to love the Lord. It's so easy to love the Lord. It's so easy to love the Lord.
It's so easy, it's so easy—Amen. It's so easy, it's so easy—love Him. It's so easy, it's so easy—Amen. It's so easy, it's so easy—love Him. It's so easy to love the Lord.
When we call on Him we see, Just how beautiful is He. Just one look—it is enough, For us all to fall in love.
Nothing else I need to do, Just to "stop" and look anew. Swells my heart with love divine, When His Spirit flows in mine.
There's no need to dwell on sin, In His blood we've entered in. Now in spirit we are free, To enjoy reality!
Crazy love is filling me! I don't care what I will be! Only one thing matters still, Lord e'en more my spirit fill!
